caption.p: Sources of human biological materials for surveillance where planned serum surveys from targeted populations are the primary objective

tr.td: Planned serum surveys from target populations
Entrance and periodic examinations of different groups (military, industry, health clinics)
Blood donors in Red Cross and similar programs (e.g., transplantation donors)
Entry tests for blood chemistries or syphilis
Counseling and testing sites, clinics for sexually transmitted diseases
